[00:09.01]
[00:10.23]La-da-da-da-dahh

[00:16.65]You know I'm mobbin with the D.R.E.
[00:19.20](YEAH YEAH YEAH

[00:25.32](Spread the weed out there!)
[00:26.53]Blaze it up, blaze it up!
[00:27.33](Just blaze that shit up nigga, yeah, 'sup Snoop??)
[00:28.53]
[00:30.37]Top Dogg, bite me all, nigga burn the shit up
[00:32.44]D-P-G-C my nigga turn that shit up
[00:34.91]C-P-T, L-B-C, yeah we hookin back up
[00:37.46]And when they bang this in the club baby you got to get up
[00:39.99]Thug niggaz drug dealers yeah they givin it up
[00:42.68]Lowlife, your life, boy we livin it up
[00:45.15]Taking chances while we dancing in the party for show
[00:47.65]Slip my hoe a forty-fo' and she got in the back do'
[00:50.13]Bitches looking at me strange but you know I don't care
[00:52.68]Step up in this motherfucker just a-swangin my hair
[00:55.22]Bitch quit talking, crip walk if you down with the set
[00:57.72]Take a bullet with some dick and take this dope from this jet
[01:00.27]Out of town, put it down for the Father of Rap
[01:02.68]And if your ass get cracked, bitch shut yo' trap
[01:05.24]Come back, get back, that's the part of success
[01:07.78]If you believe in the X you'll be relievin your stress
[01:20.45]La-da-da-da-dahh

[01:25.70]La-da-da-da-dahhh
[01:27.16]You know I'm mobbin with the D-O-double-G
[01:29.49]Straight off the fuckin streets of C-P-T
[01:32.13]King of the beats you ride to em in your Fleet (Fleetwood)
[01:34.61]or Coupe DeVille rollin on dubs
[01:36.93]How you feelin whoopty=whoop nigga whut?
[01:39.77]Dre and Snoop chronic'ed out in the 'llac
[01:42.28]with Doc in the back, sippin on 'gnac (yeah)
[01:44.68]Clip in the strap, dippin through hoods (what hoods?)
[01:47.33]Compton, Long Beach, Inglewood!
[01:49.67]South Central out to the Westside (wessyde)
[01:52.30]It's California Love, this California bud got a nigga gang of pub
[01:56.19]I'm on one, I might bail up in the Century Club
[01:58.59]with my jeans on, and my team strong
[02:01.56]Get my drink on, and my smoke on
[02:03.95]Then go home with, something to poke on (what`s up bitch?)
[02:06.51]Loc it's on for the two-triple-oh
[02:08.24]Comin real, it's the next episode...
[02:14.99]Hold up, hey
[02:17.64]for my niggaz who be thinking we soft
[02:19.81]We don't, care
[02:22.72]We gon' rock it til the wheels fall off
[02:25.00]Hold up, hey
[02:27.77]for my niggaz who be actin too bold
